cards.name: Abandoned Outpost
cards.text:
Abandoned Outpost enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Abandoned Outpost: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Aboshan's Desire
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Threshold — Enchanted creature has shroud as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Aboshan, Cephalid Emperor
cards.text:
Tap an untapped Cephalid you control: Tap target permanent.
{U}{U}{U}: Tap all creatures without flying.
cards.flavor: "No one can fight the tide forever."

cards.name: Acceptable Losses
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Acceptable Losses, discard a card at random.
Acceptable Losses deals 5 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Aegis of Honor
cards.text: {1}: The next time an instant or sorcery spell would deal damage to you this turn, that spell deals that damage to its controller instead.

cards.name: Æther Burst
cards.text: Return up to X target creatures to their owners' hands, where X is one plus the number of cards named Æther Burst in all graveyards as you cast Æther Burst.
cards.flavor: As fleeting as a cephalid's promise.

cards.name: Afflict
cards.text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: When one of the Patriarch's champions displeased him, he would only shake his finger. That was enough.

cards.name: Amugaba
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}, Discard a card: Return Amugaba to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: The aven claim it feeds on thunder and rainbows.

cards.name: Anarchist
cards.text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Those who will not follow are doomed to lead.

cards.name: Ancestral Tribute
cards.text:
You gain 2 life for each card in your graveyard.
Flashback {9}{W}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Angelic Wall
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
cards.flavor:
"The Ancestor protects us in ways we can't begin to comprehend."
—Mystic elder

cards.name: Animal Boneyard
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness."
cards.flavor:
"The animal spirits are the Ancestor's grandchildren. Remember them."
—Mystic elder

cards.name: Ashen Firebeast
cards.text: {1}{R}: Ashen Firebeast deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
cards.flavor:
"I'm not sure which impresses me most, its thoroughness or its intensity."
—Matoc, lavamancer

cards.name: Atogatog
cards.text: Sacrifice an Atog creature: Atogatog gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
cards.flavor: It relishes old-fashioned family meals.

cards.name: Aura Graft
cards.text: Gain control of target Aura that's attached to a permanent. Attach it to another permanent it can enchant.
cards.flavor: "It's not really stealing. It's more like extended borrowing."

cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Beauty stirs the memory like a sweet perfume excites the air.

cards.name: Aven Archer
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{W}, {T}: Aven Archer deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: Aimed by the eyes of eagles, their arrows never miss the mark.

cards.name: Aven Cloudchaser
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"At the Reapportionment, Eagle begged to be human. The Ancestor granted half that prayer."
—Nomad myth

cards.name: Aven Fisher
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

cards.name: Aven Flock
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Just as each added feather steadies the wing, so does the flock grow stronger with each new member.

cards.name: Aven Shrine
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player gains X life, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

cards.name: Aven Smokeweaver
cards.text: Flying, protection from red
cards.flavor: In a world still pained from burns, some are born already scarred.

cards.name: Aven Windreader
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of his or her library.
cards.flavor: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

cards.name: Balancing Act
cards.text: Each player chooses a number of permanents he or she controls equal to the number of permanents controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Each player discards cards the same way.

cards.name: Balshan Beguiler
cards.text: Whenever Balshan Beguiler deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals the top two cards of his or her library. You choose one of those cards and put it into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Balshan Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{U}, Discard a card: Return Balshan Griffin to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: It helps to have an extra direction in which to run.

cards.name: Bamboozle
cards.text: Target player reveals the top four cards of his or her library. You choose two of those cards and put them into his or her graveyard. Put the rest on top of his or her library in any order.

cards.name: Barbarian Lunatic
cards.text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Lunatic: Barbarian Lunatic deals 2 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"I once saw a single barbarian charge a band of twenty nomads. I've seen some crazy ones, too."
—Nomad sentry

cards.name: Barbarian Ring
cards.text:
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Barbarian Ring deals 1 damage to you.
Threshold — {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbarian Ring: Barbarian Ring deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Bash to Bits
cards.text:
Destroy target artifact.
Flashback {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Battle of Wits
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.
cards.flavor: The wizard who reads a thousand books is powerful. The wizard who memorizes a thousand books is insane.

cards.name: Battle Strain
cards.text: Whenever a creature blocks, Battle Strain deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
cards.flavor: The pits swallow the weak as predators swallow prey.

cards.name: Bearscape
cards.text: {1}{G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Nature is the endless dance between life and death."
—Seton, centaur druid

cards.name: Beast Attack
cards.text:
Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
Flashback {2}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Beloved Chaplain
cards.text: Protection from creatures
cards.flavor: Nomad and Nantuko, eagle and elephant; all the birds and beasts are charmed by his quiet dignity.

cards.name: Blazing Salvo
cards.text: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to him or her.
cards.flavor: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

cards.name: Blessed Orator
cards.text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.
cards.flavor: His quiet words fade into the night's chill, yet they burn into his listeners' minds with all the power of a thousand suns.

cards.name: Bloodcurdler
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Bloodcurdler gets +1/+1 and has "At the beginning of your end step, exile two cards from your graveyard."

cards.name: Bog Wreckage
cards.text:
Bog Wreckage enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Bog Wreckage: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Bomb Squad
cards.text:
{T}: Put a fuse counter on target creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a fuse counter on each creature with a fuse counter on it.
Whenever a creature has four or more fuse counters on it, remove all fuse counters from it and destroy it. That creature deals 4 damage to its controller.

cards.name: Braids, Cabal Minion
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.
cards.flavor: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."

cards.name: Buried Alive
cards.text: Search your library for up to three creature cards and put them into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The scrape of shovels and the tumble of cold dirt soon muffled their pleas.

cards.name: Burning Sands
cards.text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.
cards.flavor:
"Pain teaches lessons no scholar can."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

cards.name: Cabal Inquisitor
cards.text: Threshold — {1}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery, and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Cabal Patriarch
cards.text:
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Cabal Pit
cards.text:
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Cabal Pit deals 1 damage to you.
Threshold — {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Cabal Pit: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Cabal Shrine
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards X cards, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

cards.name: Call of the Herd
cards.text:
Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Cantivore
cards.text:
Vigilance
Cantivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of enchantment cards in all graveyards.

cards.name: Careful Study
cards.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
cards.flavor: Books are like crops—they must be thinned for best yield.

cards.name: Cartographer
cards.text: When Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Finding the way once is luck. Finding the way twice takes a good map."

cards.name: Catalyst Stone
cards.text:
Flashback costs you pay cost up to {2} less.
Flashback costs your opponents pay cost {2} more.
cards.flavor: The gems' incandescence invades the dreams of all who see them.

cards.name: Caustic Tar
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target player loses 3 life."
cards.flavor:
"Twisted magic, twisted fate,
Force the land to ooze with hate."
—Cabal chant

cards.name: Cease-Fire
cards.text:
Target player can't cast creature spells this turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: When the crimson fades from the magical embers, a final wisp of smoke will rise. Soon after, hostilities will begin anew.

cards.name: Centaur Garden
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Centaur Garden deals 1 damage to you.
Threshold — {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Centaur Garden: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Cephalid Broker
cards.text: {T}: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.
cards.flavor: Cephalids value the free exchange of ideas—except for the "free" part.

cards.name: Cephalid Coliseum
cards.text:
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Cephalid Coliseum deals 1 damage to you.
Threshold — {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Coliseum: Target player draws three cards, then discards three cards. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Cephalid Looter
cards.text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
cards.flavor: "Amazing, isn't it, what humans will throw away when they're drowning?"

cards.name: Cephalid Retainer
cards.text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
cards.flavor: Cephalids whisper flattery in your ear, put jewels in your hand, spin dreams in your head, and stick knives in your back.

cards.name: Cephalid Scout
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The more they survey the dreadful dry expanses, the more the cephalids thirst to tame them.

cards.name: Cephalid Shrine
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, counter that spell unless that player pays {X}, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as the spell.

cards.name: Chainflinger
cards.text:
{1}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Threshold — {2}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.name: Chamber of Manipulation
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Gain control of target creature until end of turn."
cards.flavor: Politics is just a subtle form of mind control—and cephalids are master politicians.

cards.name: Chance Encounter
cards.text:
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a luck counter on Chance Encounter.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Chance Encounter has ten or more luck counters on it, you win the game.
cards.flavor: The more unlikely the victory, the more memorable the success.

cards.name: Charmed Pendant
cards.text: {T}, Put the top card of your library into your graveyard: For each colored mana symbol in that card's mana cost, add one mana of that color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant. (For example, if the card's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}{B}, you add {U}{U}{B} to your mana pool.)

cards.name: Chatter of the Squirrel
cards.text:
Put a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token onto the battlefield.
Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Childhood Horror
cards.text:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Childhood Horror gets +2/+2 and can't block.

cards.name: Chlorophant
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Chlorophant.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Chlorophant has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put another +1/+1 counter on Chlorophant."

cards.name: Coffin Purge
cards.text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Flashback {B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Cognivore
cards.text:
Flying
Cognivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of instant cards in all graveyards.

cards.name: Concentrate
cards.text: Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

cards.name: Confessor
cards.text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: "There will be gains for our losses. There will be rights for our wrongs."

cards.name: Crashing Centaur
cards.text:
{G}, Discard a card: Crashing Centaur gains trample until end of turn.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Crashing Centaur gets +2/+2 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Crypt Creeper
cards.text: Sacrifice Crypt Creeper: Exile target card from a graveyard.
cards.flavor: To unearth its dinner, it inters itself.

cards.name: Crystal Quarry
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{5}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"How tragic that greed eclipses beauty."
—Seton, centaur druid

cards.name: Cultural Exchange
cards.text: Choose any number of creatures target player controls. Choose the same number of creatures another target player controls. Those players exchange control of those creatures. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

cards.name: Cursed Monstrosity
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Cursed Monstrosity becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.
cards.flavor:
"Run away! It's an . . . um . . . run away!"
—Nomad sentry

cards.name: Darkwater Catacombs
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Murky Otarian tides hide the forgotten treacheries of the Phyrexian war.

cards.name: Darkwater Egg
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Darkwater Egg: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool. Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Do you thirst for knowledge no matter the cost?"
—Watnik, master glassblower

cards.name: Decaying Soil
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile a card from your graveyard.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Decaying Soil has "Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, return that card to your hand."

cards.name: Decimate
cards.text: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land.
cards.flavor:
"Anyone can admire creation. Only a barbarian sees the beauty in demolition."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

cards.name: Decompose
cards.text: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Sheesh! How am I supposed to make a decent living around here?"
—Cabal grave robber

cards.name: Dedicated Martyr
cards.text: {W}, Sacrifice Dedicated Martyr: You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"If he's so willing to suffer for his cause, then by all means, let us oblige him."
—Cabal Patriarch

cards.name: Deep Reconnaissance
cards.text:
Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
Flashback {4}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Delaying Shield
cards.text:
If damage would be dealt to you, put that many delay counters on Delaying Shield instead.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove all delay counters from Delaying Shield. For each delay counter removed this way, you lose 1 life unless you pay {1}{W}.

cards.name: Deluge
cards.text: Tap all creatures without flying.
cards.flavor:
"From the sea came all life, and to the sea it will return. The sooner the better."
—Emperor Aboshan

cards.name: Dematerialize
cards.text:
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Demolish
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land.
cards.flavor:
"Pound the steel until it fits.
Doesn't work? Bash to bits."
—Dwarven forging song

cards.name: Demoralize
cards.text:
Each creature can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, creatures can't block this turn.

cards.name: Deserted Temple
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Untap target land.
cards.flavor: A monument to long-forgotten gods, it stands as a tribute to the fleeting nature of human ways.

cards.name: Devoted Caretaker
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Target permanent you control gains protection from instant spells and from sorcery spells until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Her eyes blaze with the strength of twenty shields. Every glance is a salvation.

cards.name: Diabolic Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The best ideas often come from the worst minds.

cards.name: Diligent Farmhand
cards.text:
{1}{G}, Sacrifice Diligent Farmhand: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
If Diligent Farmhand is in a graveyard, effects from spells named Muscle Burst count it as a card named Muscle Burst.

cards.name: Dirty Wererat
cards.text:
{B}, Discard a card: Regenerate Dirty Wererat.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Dirty Wererat gets +2/+2 and can't block.

cards.name: Divert
cards.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target unless that spell's controller pays {2}.
cards.flavor: "What's the fun of being a wizard if you can't mess with people's heads?"

cards.name: Divine Sacrament
cards.text:
White creatures get +1/+1.
Threshold — White creatures get an additional +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: Their whispered prayers rally the nomads better than any war cry could.

cards.name: Dogged Hunter
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target creature token.
cards.flavor: The relationship between hunter and hunted knows nothing of alliances.

cards.name: Dreamwinder
cards.text:
Dreamwinder can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{U}, Sacrifice an Island: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

cards.name: Druid Lyrist
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Druid Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor: The druids and the forest are in perfect harmony. They sing the same songs.

cards.name: Druid's Call
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, its controller puts that many 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Suffer the little creatures, for they may yet rise up and beat you senseless.

cards.name: Dusk Imp
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: It despises humans and squirrels and beasts and dwarves and cephalids . . . well, it despises just about everything.

cards.name: Dwarven Grunt
cards.text: Mountainwalk
cards.flavor:
Hard as stone and twice as stubborn.
—Dwarven compliment

cards.name: Dwarven Recruiter
cards.text: When Dwarven Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Dwarf cards and reveal those cards. Shuffle your library, then put them on top of it in any order.

cards.name: Dwarven Shrine
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Dwarven Shrine deals X damage to that player, where X is twice the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

cards.name: Dwarven Strike Force
cards.text: Discard a card at random: Dwarven Strike Force gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Any given foothill may hide dozens of dwarves waiting to spill from their tunnels like fire ants.

cards.name: Earnest Fellowship
cards.text: Each creature has protection from its colors.
cards.flavor:
"The world has enough strife as it is. Where would we be if we turned against each other?"
—Pianna, nomad captain

cards.name: Earth Rift
cards.text:
Destroy target land.
Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Elephant Ambush
cards.text:
Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.
Flashback {6}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Ember Beast
cards.text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.
cards.flavor:
Spot one ember beast, attack.
Spot a second, best fall back.
—Dwarven saying

cards.name: Embolden
cards.text:
Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.
Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Engulfing Flames
cards.text:
Engulfing Flames deals 1 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Entomb
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: A grave is the safest place to store ill-gotten treasures.

cards.name: Epicenter
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices a land.
Threshold — Each player sacrifices all lands he or she controls instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: Sometimes destruction is Dominaria's way of rebuilding. Sometimes it's not.

cards.name: Escape Artist
cards.text:
Escape Artist can't be blocked.
{U}, Discard a card: Return Escape Artist to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "Not even my shadow knows where I am."

cards.name: Execute
cards.text:
Destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Any fool who would die for honor is better off dead."
—Cabal Patriarch

cards.name: Extract
cards.text: Search target player's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.flavor: To say Nixar had a splitting headache would be a bit of an understatement.

cards.name: Face of Fear
cards.text: {2}{B}, Discard a card: Face of Fear gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"It's only frightened five people to death. Not my best work."
—Braids, dementia summoner

cards.name: Famished Ghoul
cards.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Famished Ghoul: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
cards.flavor: Memories have distinct tastes. Its favorites are the sickly sweetness of lost love and the bitter smokiness of cruel murder.

cards.name: Fervent Denial
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor:
"Your tenacity is admirable. And futile."
—Emperor Aboshan

cards.name: Filthy Cur
cards.text: Whenever Filthy Cur is dealt damage, you lose that much life.
cards.flavor: Some things even fleas won't bite.

cards.name: Firebolt
cards.text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Reach out and torch someone.

cards.name: Flame Burst
cards.text: Flame Burst deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Flame Burst in all graveyards.
cards.flavor: As hot as a dwarf's rage.

cards.name: Fledgling Imp
cards.text: {B}, Discard a card: Fledgling Imp gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Imps aren't born knowing how to fly—just how to annoy.

cards.name: Frenetic Ogre
cards.text: {R}, Discard a card at random: Frenetic Ogre gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The best thing about ogres is that they never try to sneak up on you.

cards.name: Frightcrawler
